name: MTLFunctionDescriptor
desc: A description of a function object to create.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the function to fetch from the library.

items.name: var specializedName: String?
items.desc: A new name for the created function object.

items.name: var constantValues: MTLFunctionConstantValues?
items.desc: The set of constant values assigned to the function constants.

items.name: var options: MTLFunctionOptions
items.desc: Flags specifying how Metal should create the new function object.

items.name: var binaryArchives: [MTLBinaryArchive]?
items.desc: The binary archives to search for a previously-compiled version of this function.

items.name: struct MTLFunctionOptions
items.desc: Options that define how Metal creates the function object.

items.name: class MTLLinkedFunctions
items.desc: A set of related functions that Metal links to when necessary to create the function object.
